players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I'm the mafioso, stay cautious. Alice, use your detective skills wisely."
Charlie: "I'll watch Bob closely. Alice, investigate him."
You: "Bob and Charlie, be vigilant. I'm the detective and investigated Bob—check your suspicions."
Bob: "Stay sharp, Alice targeted me. Watch Charlie closely."
Charlie: "Bob, keep an eye on Alice. Charlie and I will watch you."
You: "Charlie, stay alert. Bob knows you're suspecting him."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
